index.md.Cette partie vous permet de configurer l: This part allows you to configure the image quality.
index.md.La configuration est assez simple vous a: The configuration is quite simple, you call the send send action (called "Recording") in a scenario.
index.md.Par défaut il suffit de mettre le nombre: By default, just put the number of captures you want in the "number of captures or options" field, but you can go further with options (see details below "advanced options of captures").
